title: Community of Inquiry-Based Introductory Programming Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computational Thinking and Problem-Solving Skills
context.additional_context: 3D Virtual Environment-Based Collaborative Learning for Pre-Service Teacher Training

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic programming concepts (variables, loops, conditionals) through team-based projects in a 3D virtual environment
Learners can collaboratively design programming problem-solving processes through social interactions with pre-service peer teachers
Learners can develop programming learning modules applicable to real educational settings using digital fabrication tools based on constructivist theory
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
